exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R n : nat IHn : sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => u (n - k)%nat) n = sum_f_R0 u n Unable to unify "sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => u (n - k)%nat) n + u (S n)" with "sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => u match k with | 0%nat => S n | S l => (n - l)%nat end) n + u (n - n)%nat".

original: induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. reflexivity.
